body.name: Solgar Vitamin C 1000 mg, 100 Vegetable Capsules - Antioxidant & Immune Support - Overall Health - Healthy Skin & Joints - Bioflavonoids Supplement - Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free, Kosher - 100 Servings
features: Immune Support; Solgar Vitamin C 1000 mg helps support a healthy immune system during and after physical exercise; It also plays an essential role in the functioning of white blood cells which are vital components of the immune system
Powerful Antioxidant; Vitamin C helps fight free radicals, which can lead to oxidative stress and the premature aging of cells
Healthy Skin & Joints; One of the primary functions of Vitamin C is collagen formation, which is important for healthy skin and joints
Non-GMO & Gluten Free; Solgar Vitamin C 1000 mg Vegetable Capsules are suitable for vegans; Free of: gluten, wheat, dairy, soy, yeast, sugar, sodium, artificial flavor and sweetener

The Gold Standard: For over 70 years, Solgar has been committed to quality, health, and well-being. Our mission is to create the finest nutritional supplements in small batches, through tireless research, using only the finest raw materials

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to Vitamin C and brand
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this Vitamin C by Solgar, as it is made from high quality ingredients, which has helped me tremendously. The capsules are just the right size, with no bad smell and leaves no undesirable aftertaste. They’re also very easy to swallow.I highly recommend this highly effective Vitamin C capsule, and brand to others as this is definitely worth the asking price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great delivery, packaged well!
reviews.reviewText: Just recieved my order and was most impressed with the packaging. Shrink sleeved bottle and bubble-packed box. So unlike most of the stuff I get directly from Amazon... Nature & Herbs really takes care of their product delivery and the product itself seems well made and, hopefully, will suppement my diet as I like. Great job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for People prone to Muscle Ache and Tiredness.
reviews.reviewText: 10/10 Visible Improvement- feeling less tired, and less muscle ache in less than 3 weeks.7/10 Swallowing. Had a bit of trouble, but not a big issue.10/10 Great Value for Money. Will be buying this again after 100 tablets run out!I bought the Solgar Vitamin C 1000 mg for my mom, who's a senior, and it's been a fantastic choice. With 100 vegetable capsules, this supplement is loaded with antioxidants and immune support. It's really helped her overall health, skin, and joints – and the addition of bioflavonoids is a great touch. Plus, with 100 servings in the bottle, it's been a convenient and effective addition to her daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Basically Pure vitamins! Great quality, have reordered few times!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don't like chewable Vitamin C or the giant powder coated pills
reviews.reviewText: Whether vitamins actually do anything at all is still debatable for me, I never feel any better after taking them, no matter if I'm faithful to it or not. So I have no idea if they even help or not. But I am told to take vitamins so I do, for Vitamin C it is hard finding capsules. It seems everything is a sugary gummy, powder-coated pill that's huge and impossible to swallow or those gross chewables.These capsules are a decent size and easier to swallow, so for vitamins, they are good. Long term results are pending, I guess time will tell with that one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I don't see a big difference....
reviews.reviewText: I am just getting back into taking multi vitamins in a more regular basis in an effort to provide my body the best chance to lose weight naturally. I purchased these because I had read some great reviews. Once I started taking them, I didn't notice much of a difference outside of the tale tale sign that someone is taking vitamin (neon urine). After a few days, I did experience a little tingling sensation in my cheeks and finger tips. I don't know what that was. One thing I really didn't like is the fact that one serving is three large pills a day. That was hard to swallow (no pun intended). Not bad though. Just not exceptional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior Product, Easy to Swallow, and Kosher as Well!
reviews.reviewText: I read quite a few reviews before I purchased this product. Some reviews called it unusually large, but easy to swallow because of it being in capsule form, so I took a chance. I purchase Solgar supplements with the exception of one product, but I'm switching over to Solgar on that the next time I have to order it. Solgar is a superior product and you ALWAYS get what is promised. When I was in the hospital, I told them I had to have Solgar melatonin in order to sleep as well as other Solgar products. The pharmacists put my Solgar products through a qualitative analysis to be certain they were safe, and the amazing thing is that they called every Solgar product a "designer supplement" and okayed every one of them! That's how good Solgar is! I had what looked like a very severe vitamin C deficiency and had a few Solgar Vitamin C caps on hand, so I took 1,000 mgs and the next morning, like magic, the symptoms were almost completely G-O-N-E!!!! These came just in time as I ran out of my small stash of other Solgar Vitamin C in a different form. Bless this capsule, it's no bigger than any of my other Solgar supplements. I do have trouble swallowing pills, but these are easy to swallow, and are no bigger than the usual Solgar capsules. Another reason that I purchase Solgar is that I take kosher supplements only - I also eat only kosher foods - and just about all the Solgar products are kosher, as this one is. This is a great product, easy to swallow even for those like myself who have trouble swallowing, is high in quality, and because it's water soluble, is fast acting. You will not regret purchasing this product. It's truly superior to other Vitamin C supplements on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Proveedor muy bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Big bottle and easy to swallow
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that its a big quality brand, easy to swallow capsules and fast arrival. If it works? I can't say yet, only been taking them for 2 weeks, but i will be updating next month...Pros: Easy to swallow and small size caps.Cons: None yet.

En primer lugar, la calidad del producto es excepcional. La marca en la que confié utiliza ingredientes de alta calidad y se somete a rigurosos controles de calidad para garantizar la pureza y potencia de la vitamina C. Esto me brinda tranquilidad al saber que estoy consumiendo un producto confiable y efectivo.Además, he experimentado notables mejoras en mi salud desde que comencé a tomar esta vitamina C. Como alguien que vive en una región donde la exposición al sol es limitada, me preocupa la deficiencia de vitamina C. Sin embargo, desde que incorporé este suplemento a mi rutina diaria, he notado un aumento en mi energía y vitalidad.También he observado mejoras en mi sistema inmunológico. Antes, solía sufrir frecuentes resfriados y gripes, pero desde que tomo esta vitamina C, mi sistema inmunológico parece estar más fuerte y resistente. Me siento más protegido y menos propenso a enfermedades.Otro beneficio significativo de esta vitamina C es su impacto positivo en mi estado de ánimo. Durante los meses de invierno, solía experimentar episodios de tristeza y fatiga debido a la falta de luz solar. Sin embargo, desde que empecé a tomar este suplemento, mi estado de ánimo ha mejorado notablemente. Me siento más enérgico, positivo y motivado, incluso en los días nublados.En resumen, estoy encantado con los resultados obtenidos gracias a este producto de vitamina C. Su calidad, efectividad y los múltiples beneficios que ha aportado a mi salud hacen que sea una excelente adición a mi rutina diaria. Lo recomendaría a cualquiera que busque un suplemento de vitamina C confiable para mejorar su bienestar general.
